item.title: LibreNMS 安裝設定紀錄
item.description: 部署環境 OS: Debian12 CPU: 2 Sockets, 2 Cores RAM: 6G Database: MariaDB: 11.4 System Requirement LibreNMS CPU: 2 Sockets, 4 Cores Memory: 2G Disk Type: Raid 1, SSD Disk Space: 18GB Devices: 20 Ports: 133 Health sensors: 47 Load: < 0.1 MySQL CPU: 1 Socket, 2 Cores Memory: 2G Disk Type: Raid 1, SSD Disk Space: 30GB Load: < 0.1 安裝前準被 librenms Domain : moniter.home.pollochang.work librenms web server Admin User 帳號: polloadmin Admin User 密碼: password Admin User Email: email@example.
